mapper.select: select sido_code sidoCode, sido_name sidoName from sido order by sidoCode

select ai.content_id, ai.content_type_id, ai.title, ai.addr1, ai.zipcode, ai.first_image, ai.first_image2, ai.readcount, ai.latitude, ai.longitude, ad.overview from attraction_info ai, attraction_description ad where ai.content_id = ad.content_id and ai.addr1 like concat('%', (select sido_name from sido where sido_code = #{sidoCode}), '%') and ai.addr1 like concat('%', (select gugun_name from gugun where gugun_code = #{gugunCode} and sido_code = #{sidoCode}), '%')
and ai.content_type_id = #{contentTypeId}
